introduction_to_video::markdown_card_1::: Turabahanura dushimitse yuko mwoheraheza urutonde rw'ivyigwa vy'umutekano n'ubumenyeshamakuru imbere yuko mutangura. Izo nyigisho zirangwa mugice c'amasanamu (section video), ariko zirakwiriye yuko uzitaho cane. Atazo ukurikiranye, birashoboka yuko wishira mungorane canke ukazishiramwo abandi.
introduction_to_video::markdown_card_0:::
Amasanamu n'igikoresho kibasha neza muvyo gutera inkuru. Ameze neza, amasanamu afatanya ububasha bw'amajwi hamwe nubunyaruke bwamafoto kugira atangure guhuza neza nabayaraba.  
Bishobora kuba nahone igikorwa kiremereye umbwambere ugitangura kuyakoresha. Ariko cokimwe nkibindi bikoresho, hariho ibikurikizwa hamwe nibikorwa ushobora kwiga bikakuyobora murizi ntambwe zambere.
introduction_to_video::title: Intangamarara y'amasanamu
introduction_to_video::markdown_card_2::: Inyigisho ziraha zifise intumbero yogutahura amasanamu nk'ubuhinga bwogutunganya inkuru ukoresheje StoryMaker. Mugihe uzoheza ururutonde rw'ivyigwa, uzoba ufise ugutahura kw'ibintu nshingiro, ubuhinga, hamwe n'ibikurikizwa intambwe kuyindi mugutegura amakuru agizwe n'inkuru zamasanamu.
